ComicInfo.Summary: Righteous revenge goes wrong when your bad guy is Luca Torelli, the infamous Torpedo! Burned by Torelli’s wanton criminality, a journalist exposes his identity to the world. Will the Caputo brothers deliver justice on Wendy’s behalf?
